name: Battle board game
description:
Strategy board game, easy rules and complex strategies

Welcome to the game board game and transfer goodbye to the complex and tedious chess game

The game provides the same number and type of soldiers for both players, each player the right to move his soldiers during his role, and the goal is to destroy the enemy HQ.

The game is random generate of different of tiles type (Terrain types) that affect game strategies.

This game have simple rules, but design to allow players make complex strategies.

This game can be played in video game, but also it can be played in table or broad that make easy by your hand.
